title: Integral.LoL Challenger team Looking for Coach and Analyst
body:
The new Integral Nation league of legends team is currently looking for an experienced coach and analyst to help them prepare for the Oceanic Open Ladder and the Oceanic Challenger Series, in the near future.
Integral.LoL previously AnVaro, are currently number 3 on the Ranked 5 Challenger ladder under their old team name "AnVaro". Integral.LoL recently were defeated in the Oceanic Challenger Series Wildcard Qualifiers by team "Abyss White" the team had a decent shot at winning the OCS Spot.

The Teams goals for the near Future - 
To Reach rank 1 on the Challenger 5s Ladder.
To Make the Oceanic Challenger Series.

The Team's ultimate goal - 
To Reach the Oceanic Pro League.

The Requirements we expect from our Potential coach are as follows
A Certain amount of hours put into providing in depth Analysis of games, Someone that can provide well written and in depth analysis on Teams in tournaments we enter and finally someone that will be able to keep motivational levels up even in times of defeat.

If interested in the position please contact me here
Email: lachiemiracleslol@gmail.com
Twitter : @IntegralNation | @iN_Icarus
Integral Icarus - LoL Analyst and Manager

replies.body: What happened to the previous coach?

Hey I work for OceanicCoaching.org I would like to talk to you about this opening. Contact me in PvP.net, [Oceanic Coaching ](https://www.facebook.com/OceanicCoaching)Facebook messaging or AusieJamster@gmail.com
